Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)f.name: +forwardErrorNotifications:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)f.abstract: sets the location for error dialogue handling - in the SDK or in the host app.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)l.name: +logout
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)l.abstract: Log out user from the default SDK.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)l.name: -logout
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)l.abstract: Log out user from an SDK instance.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)a.name: +authenticateWithEmail:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)a.abstract: Class-level lighweight authentication for users with email identifier but no password.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)a.name: +authenticateWithEmail:password:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)a.abstract: Class-level heavyweight authentication for users with email identifier and password.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)a.name: -authenticateWithEmail:password:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)a.abstract: Instance-level heavyweight authentication for users with email identifier and password.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)g.name: +getDailyStats:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)g.abstract: gets daily stats for the last seven days for this user

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)s.name: +sdkVersion
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)s.abstract: A string representation of the VPKit version.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)c.name: +copyVeep:toKit:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)c.abstract: Copy veeps from the default app to a destination app. The default app is invoked by the class method. The destination app instance is passed in as a parameter.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)d.name: +deleteVeep:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)d.abstract: Remove the most recent version of a veep from the default app.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)d.name: -deleteVeep:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)d.abstract: Remove the most recent version of a veep from an app instance.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)d.name: +deleteVeeps:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(cm)d.abstract: Remove all versions of a veep from the default app.

Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)d.name: -deleteVeeps:completion:
Classes/VPKit.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKit(im)d.abstract: Remove all versions of a veep from an app instance.

Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.name: margin
Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.abstract: set this property to adjust the left and right margins for the Veep View.

Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.name: previewIconWidth
Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.abstract: set this property to adjust the VPKPreview icon width.

Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.name: font
Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.abstract: VPKit font styles are set and adjusted in this VPKFontStyles object.

Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.name: color
Classes/VPKStyles.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKSty.abstract: VPKit color styles are set and adjusted in this VPKColorStyles object.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: veepId
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: Read-only veepId - obtained from the VPKImage if initalised with a veepId, or from the imageURL if there is a matching veep available.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: delegate
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: The optional delegate affords the host app full control over the invoking of Veep Viewer and Veep Editors. If not set, VPKPreview will handle the presenting and dismissing of Viewers and Editors. If set, the host app is responsible for VeepViewer and VeepEditor management using the touch delegate callback.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: passThroughDelegate
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: The optional pass-through delegate sends a tap gesture recogniser message to the receiver in the event that the VPKPreview doesn’t handle it’s tap. This is useful where the VPKPreview is view-only and the image has no associated veep content. and the host app wishes to respond to taps that the VPKPreview will ignore.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: animateTouch
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: if YES the preview will animate when touched for better touch feedback.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: iconLength
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: adjusts the size of the icon. Default is 50.

Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.name: +previewURLforYoutubeId:
Classes/VPKPreview.html#/c:objc(cs)VPKPr.abstract: Utility function for preview of youtube veep (experimental).

Classes/VPKParseableObject.html#/c:objc(.name: -jsonKeysToPropertyNames
Classes/VPKParseableObject.html#/c:objc(.abstract: tanslate JSON key to obj property name

Classes/VPKParseableObject.html#/c:objc(.name: -arrayClasses
Classes/VPKParseableObject.html#/c:objc(.abstract: collections that need sub-parsing. This is not necessary for standard plist collections (NSDictionary, NSArray)

Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: dateFormatter
Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: Formatter for transcribing to and from ISO8601

Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: values
Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: Array of values for all series and all dates. A one-dimensional array of values in series:date order.

Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: -referrals
Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: Array of referrals values for the dates contained in the dates array.

Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: -views
Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: Array of views values for the dates contained in the dates array.

Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: -previewtouches
Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: Array of previewtouches values for the dates contained in the dates array.

Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: -expansions
Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: Array of expansions values for the dates contained in the dates array.

Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: -sales
Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: Array of sales values for the dates contained in the dates array.

Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: -veepselects
Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: Array of veepselects values for the dates contained in the dates array.

Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: -impressions
Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: Array of impressions values for the dates contained in the dates array.

Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.name: -navigations
Classes/VPKDailyStats.html#/c:objc(cs)VP.abstract: Array of navigations values for the dates contained in the dates array.

Classes/VPKColorStyles.html.name: VPKColorStyles
Classes/VPKColorStyles.html.abstract: VPKit color styles are set and adjusted here.

Classes/VPKCompetitiveStatsItem.html.name: VPKCompetitiveStatsItem
Classes/VPKCompetitiveStatsItem.html.abstract: Model object for competitive stats data represented as float percentile and int value

Classes/VPKFontStyles.html.name: VPKFontStyles
Classes/VPKFontStyles.html.abstract: VPKit font styles are set and adjusted here.

Classes/VPKParseableObject.html.name: VPKParseableObject
Classes/VPKParseableObject.html.abstract: Abstract superclass for automated parsing of JSON to model objects

Classes/VPKStyles.html.name: VPKStyles
Classes/VPKStyles.html.abstract: Use VPKStyles and it’s subclasses to alter the default appearance of the VPKit UI.

Classes/VPKit.html.abstract: Public entry point for the VPKit framework
